name: git_app_builder
title: App Builder (git)
summary: Build an app or applet from a git repo
description:
Builds your app from a git repository.

The App Builder does the following:

* Clones your source from a git repo, optionally using credentials specified by you
* Builds an applet with `./configure` and `make && make install` (optional; only run if a `./configure` file and a makefile are found, respectively)
* Uploads the resulting applet to DNAnexus and creates an app
